  That would be=
 an interesting twist, but I have some reservations
  and/or corrections.

=
  1) Since the chars will literally be unearthed, it is only fitting
  that=
 they won't be reactivated by the ones they were with. Because of
  that, t=
hey will be found by the Pacificus, the Bushidos, the Silver
  Wings, or th=
e Iron Skulls. The Watchers don't perform archeological
  searches; they ha=
ve other business to tend to.

  2) We'll also need to determine where the =
characters are reactivated.
  After all, it will play a role in the reactio=
ns. Just imagine when
  they find out the new bot in Olympus is a dreaded m=
inion...

  3) If the council decides the randomness, how will their char
 =
 distribution be random?
